about.title: Front-end Developer &
about.subtitle: Founder of CodeBrew Labs
about.description1: At CodeBrew Labs, I combined my two greatest passions: coffee and code. As a front-end developer, I create unique digital experiences while enjoying the finest cups of coffee.
about.description2: Specialized in React, Next.js and TypeScript, I transform ideas into modern and intuitive interfaces. Just like a barista extracts the best from each bean, I extract the maximum from each line of code to deliver exceptional products.
about.description3: At CodeBrew Labs, each project is prepared with the same dedication as a specialty coffee: attention to detail, refined process and extraordinary results.
